channel.title: A major Glitch Occuring Within The Sunscape Server
channel.description:
I have noticed recently that if when I attempts to use the skill [i]High Level Alchemy[/i] the sevrer is dropping my connection. To be honest I am the only person that I can say is having this problem but it might be a good idea to check just in case. Thank you for your time.
Signed. Ino Yamanaka A.K.A lv 103 after playing for one day yesterday lol.

item.title: A major Glitch Occuring Within The Sunscape Server
item.dc:creator: @Masood Masood
item.description:
@Masood wrote:

Yes it happins to me aswell and when connection is droped, i can’t log back in for like 2 hours.
its sooo anoying and i love sunscape =\

but i never ever use high alch again =]
btw when going to wildy, type ::clientdrop but don’t press enter and when you are dying, press enter and you will log out automaticly without waiting 30 seconds and losing all your items =]

Read full topic
item.source: A major Glitch Occuring Within The Sunscape Server
